column1: * 1923 – Voice actor Peter Pratt is born.
* 1956 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to E. Rasdall.
* 1966 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to George Sayer (21 March 1966).
* 1967 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Humphrey Carpenter.
* 2007 – The Lord of the Rings Online: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
column2: "The City of Kings" is released in North America.

column1: * 2011 – The Lord of the Rings Online#Update 2: Echoes of the Dead
column2: the second update of The Lord of the Rings Online

column1: * 2011 – Principal photography for The Hobbit (film series) begins.
** Borondir is on his way in search of the Éothéod.
** Aragorn delivers Gollum as a prisoner to Thranduil of Mirkwood.
** Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee continue their journey along the road to Barad-dûr.Category:Dates
